rule: The output must ensure the description does not exceed 80 words.
input: A surfer riding a massive wave at sunrise, with golden light illuminating the water. The image should evoke thrill and adventure.
validityText:
The input is a description of a desired AI photo. It mentions the subject (a surfer riding a massive wave), their characteristics (riding a massive wave), timing and lighting (at sunrise, with golden light illuminating the water), the background and setting (massive wave, water), and the feeling the image should evoke (thrill and adventure). The input is written in English and combines artistic insight with precise imagery. It does not exceed 80 words and is written in a single paragraph.

OK
coverageText: Generate an AI photo of a surfer riding a massive wave, their silhouette sharp and dynamic against the backdrop of a sunrise. The golden light of dawn should beautifully illuminate the water, creating a radiant and almost surreal glow. The background should feature a vast, open ocean merging with the horizon touched by warm hues of the rising sun. Capture the thrilling moment and sense of adventure as the waves crash and curl around the fearless surfer.
coverageEvalText:
The output follows the description guidelines correctly: it describes the subject (surfer riding a massive wave), includes characteristics (sharp silhouette, dynamic, fearless), details the timing and lighting (sunrise, golden light of dawn, radiant and surreal glow), and provides background information (vast open ocean, horizon, warm hues of rising sun). It ends with the feeling the image should evoke (thrilling moment, sense of adventure).

OK
